start.description: You find yourself at the entrance of Shmoopland, a magical realm full of wonder and mystery. The air sparkles with possibility, and a cheerful sign welcomes visitors.

description_templates: The {time_of_day} finds the town square {activity_level}. {weather_effect} The magical fountain sprays {fountain_color} water, creating a mesmerizing display.
You're in the heart of Shmoopland, where {time_of_day} brings {square_atmosphere}. {npc_presence}
You find yourself in the magical marketplace, where {market_feature}. {weather_effect}
Bottles of {potion_color} liquid line the shelves of this mysterious shop. {ambient_effect}
The air is thick with {magical_scent} as you explore the potion maker's domain. {shop_activity}

park.description: The Whispering Park is a peaceful garden where flowers sing soft melodies. Butterflies with tiny lanterns flutter about, creating a magical light show.

description_templates: The {time_of_day} light plays across the tower's {tower_feature}. {magical_effect}
Standing at the base of the tower, you notice {tower_detail}. {ambient_magic}
From this height, you can see {vista_description}. {magical_workspace}

weather_effect: Gentle sparkles of magic drift through the air.
A warm breeze carries the scent of enchanted flowers.
Tiny rainbow clouds float lazily overhead.
The air shimmers with magical potential.
merchant_description: A wise-looking merchant arranges floating crystals in their display.
Merchants call out their magical wares with melodious voices.
A mysterious vendor juggles bottles of color-changing potions.
ambient_effect: Tiny sprites dart between the shelves, organizing ingredients.
A cauldron in the corner bubbles with rainbow foam.
Magical wind chimes play a soothing melody.

greetings: Welcome, traveler! Looking for something magical?
Ah, a customer! What catches your eye?
The finest magical wares in all of Shmoopland!

positive: Excellent choice! The magic practically chose you.
A wise decision! This item has been waiting for the right owner.
Wonderful! May it bring you magical adventures.
negative: Perhaps something else would suit your magical needs?
No worries! The right enchantment will find you.
Take your time! Magic can't be rushed.

greetings: Ah, a seeker of magical knowledge!
Welcome to my tower of wonders!
Mind the floating books, they're quite shy.

positive: Indeed! Your magical intuition serves you well.
The arcane arts smile upon your choice.

negative: Hmm, perhaps we should consult a different grimoire.

welcome_sign.description: A cheerful sign welcoming visitors to Shmoopland
welcome_sign.examine_text: The sign reads: 'Welcome to Shmoopland! Where magic and whimsy come together. Please enjoy your stay and remember: everything is possible with a sprinkle of imagination!'
